data.name: Welcome to Pussy Paradise
data.detailed_description:
Story

A whole theme park to yourself, no lines, no crowds, and dripping hungry snatches as far as the eye can see! Seem too good to be true? Well, not for our protagonist Kazuya and his certified extra-fertile splooge. In an effort to keep the birth rate up places like this (and maybe some shopping districts) have been set up for well endowed individuals so they can do their part by impregnating people 24/7!

Rina will give you the tour from Water Slides to Ferris Wheels each ride has a sexy twist! There is a petting zoo of chicks in cosplay, a merry-go-round but instead of riding a pony you'll find a cutie ready and waiting to take a ride on you. So what are you waiting for? Come on down to Pussy Paradise Park~

Features

Translated version of the original Japanese Visual Novel

All the female characters are fully voiced with original Japanese dialogue

Original artwork HD upscaled with 16:9 and 4:3 variants

Hours of story content

Audio including music and special effects

Enhanced with character sprite animations

Gallery and Scene selections

15 wild rides to enjoy at Pussy Paradise Park

Welcome to Pussy Paradise is the English localization of a Visual Novel originally created by prolific Japanese developer Norn/Miel. We at Cherry Kiss aim to provide an authentic Japanese Visual Novel experience to gamers outside of Japan.

** PLEASE NOTE **

All characters described and visually represented in this game are over 18 years of age, and no actual, nor identifiable minor was used in the production of this game.

data.short_description: A whole theme park to yourself, no lines, no crowds, and dripping hungry snatches as far as the eye can see! The only thing you need to worry about is being hung enough to ride~

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.6+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

highlighted.name: What a long strange visit it's been...

content_descriptors.notes: There are scenes in the game that include: nudity, sexual jokes/innuendo, and graphic descriptions of sexual activities.
